parametrized_description: A person purchases a number of each of NumSupplements supplement types to meet the minimum requirements for NumNutrients nutrients. Each supplement type i provides NutrientContent[i][j] units of nutrient j and has a cost of CostPerPill[i] per pill. The objective is to minimize the total cost while ensuring that for each nutrient j, the total obtained is at least MinRequirement[j].

NutrientContent.description: Amount of nutrient j per pill of supplement i

MinRequirement.description: Minimum required units of nutrient j

CostPerPill.description: Cost per pill of supplement i

NumPillsSupplement.description: Number of pills of supplement i

constraints.description: For each nutrient j, the total amount of nutrient j obtained from the supplements must be at least MinRequirement[j].

code.gurobipy: model.addConstrs((quicksum(NutrientContent[i][j] * NumPillsSupplement[i] for i in range(NumSupplements)) >= MinRequirement[j] for j in range(NumNutrients)))

constraints.description: The number of pills purchased for each supplement must be a non-negative integer.

objective.description: Minimize the total cost, which is the sum of CostPerPill[i] multiplied by the number of pills purchased for each supplement i, while ensuring that for each nutrient j, the total obtained is at least MinRequirement[j].

code.gurobipy: model.setObjective(quicksum(CostPerPill[i] * NumPillsSupplement[i] for i in range(NumSupplements)), GRB.MINIMIZE)
